story_summary: Dmitri is in a state of feverish agitation, struggling with his destiny and anxiously awaiting Grushenka's decision between him and Fyodor Pavlovitch. He decides to repay Katerina Ivanovna the three thousand roubles he owes before starting a new life with Grushenka and seeks financial help from Kuzma Samsonov, Grushenka's protector. Samsonov refuses to assist Dmitri and mocks him, causing Dmitri to leave hopeful but ultimately humiliated.
